availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Kentucky. Worked as the sheriff of Mercer County in 1860. Owned two slaves in 1860.

Spouse: Mary A. Tompkins
Children: Bettie W Tompkins, Anna Tompkins, Mary A Tompkins

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, page 29.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, Harrodsburg, page 6.
U.S. Find a Grave Index, 1600-Present, George W. Tompkins, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=21004869&ref=acom accessed 05/16/2017.
